title: Definition of dominant strategy in duopoly

content.prompt: In a market with two firms, a firm that has a dominant strategy will do which of the following?

choices.label: Maintain that strategy independent of the strategies chosen by its competitor.
Adjust its strategies based on the strategies chosen by its competitor.
Make the first move, and wait to see whether its competitor responds to the move.
Keep its competitor guessing about its next move.
Collude with its competitor to reduce uncertainty.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
